data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Orci, Kirill Márk, Szövényi, Gergely, Nagy, Barnabás (2010): Isophya sicula sp. n. (Orthoptera: Tettigonioidea), a new, morphologically cryptic bush-cricket species from the Eastern Carpathians (Romania) recognized from its peculiar male calling song. Zootaxa 2627: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198254
